```{r, 'download-refs', echo=F, cache=F, warning=F, eval=F}
library(RefManageR)

fileUrl <- "http://bit.ly/my_bib"
download.file(fileUrl, 
              destfile = "./assets/bib/publicationsCVclean.bib", 
              method = "curl")
bib <- ReadBib("./assets/bib/publicationsCVclean.bib", check = FALSE)
```
